metadata.synopsis: Kicks off conflict between two or more caravan members if they are all alive at the bridge next to the town, after the harpers' ambush.

0.speaker: Kar'niss
0.text: Shadows and heretics, Majesty. But they won't stop us. They can't stop us.
0.context: NodeContext: Outburst - a little crazed as a whispering he's been hearing picks up again
